select oa.related_no,-- 护士编号 oa.order_no,-- 订单编号 oa.user_id, -- 用户Id oa.appoint_date,-- 预约时间 oa.address, -- 预约地址 ehs.person_barcode_confirmed, -- 体检人二维码是否确认(0:未确认/1:已确认) ehs.sample_code, -- 样本编码 ehs.draw_completed, -- 抽血完成标记(0:未完成/1:已完成) ehs.draw_complete_time, -- 抽血完成时间 ehs.is_handovered, -- 是否交接 si.name, -- 机构名称 ehs.handover_time, -- 提交时间 ehs.handover_by, -- 提交人 oa.appraisal, -- 评分 om.amount,-- 费用 sn.contact_no1-- 护士手机号
FROM exam_handover_sheet as ehs LEFT JOIN order_appointment as oa ON ehs.order_no=oa.order_no LEFT JOIN order_main as om ON ehs.order_no=om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_nurse as sn ON oa.related_no=sn.nurse_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution as si ON si.institution_id=oa.institution_id WHERE ehs.order_no=#{orderNo}

select oa.related_no,-- 护士编号 oa.order_no,-- 订单编号 oa.user_id, -- 用户Id ub.full_name, -- 姓名 ub.head_image,-- 头像 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) as age,-- 年龄 ub.id_card_no,-- 身份证号 ub.cellphone_no,-- 手机号 oa.appoint_date,-- 预约时间 oa.address, -- 预约地址 ehs.sample_code -- 样本编码 FROM exam_handover_sheet as ehs LEFT JOIN order_appointment as oa ON ehs.order_no=oa.order_no LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=oa.user_id WHERE ehs.order_no=#{orderNo}
